statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' AND (age < 25 OR age >= 50);

DELETE FROM preferences_table WHERE preference_id = 50 AND customer_id = 200;
DELETE FROM customer_preferences WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE customer_id = 2 AND campaign_id = 10;
DELETE FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_id = 2001 AND customer_id = 1002 AND click_count > 10;
